content: **the story ** simply put - it s valentine s day and i have a beautiful skein of yarn so why not make something pretty and well socks **notes ** * these socks are worked one at a time from the top down using the magic loop method and a modified eye of partridge gusset heel * written and charted instructions are provided the chart only indicates the sts on the front/instep of the sock all back/sole sts will be worked in stockinette * these socks are identical to one another knit two to make a pair * in case of using dpns assume that the front needle is synonymous with needles 1 & 2 and that the back needle is synonymous with needles 3 & 4 * slip all sts purlwise unless otherwise noted
